sys_remote_update_set.name: OCIO SR 2018 11 21 a

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_2882e24cdb8d278050479eb6db9619d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Requested For/Read only</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Requested For on Load
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Mathew Kuriakose     Initial implementation  

 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {

var CheckIsMemberOfObj_2 = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.getXML(script_response_2);
 
function script_response_2(response_2) {
	
var script_answer_2 = response_2.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var is_SR= g_user.hasRole('bcgov_sr_service_manager');
	//var is_admin =g_user.hasRole('admin');
	if(g_form.getValue('u_requested_for') ==''&& is_SR==false &&script_answer_2!='true'){
		
		g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',userID);
		
	}
//make field read only
if(script_answer_2 == 'true')
{
    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);

}

else{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	

}	
}

}			
			
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-04 23:28:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2882e24cdb8d278050479eb6db9619d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requested For/Read only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2882e24cdb8d278050479eb6db9619d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 19:34:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d9a26b3e4f671300c8030fbf9310c7da
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Fields Read Only</name><order>500</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-43 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */



function onLoad() {
	
var CheckIsMemberOfObj = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.getXML(script_response);
 
function script_response(response) {
	
var script_answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

if(script_answer == 'true')
{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);



}

else

{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);

}

}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-31 03:39:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d9a26b3e4f671300c8030fbf9310c7da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Fields Read Only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d9a26b3e4f671300c8030fbf9310c7da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 19:28:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Requested for Read Only</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-366 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */

function onLoad() {
	
var CheckIsMemberOfObj = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.getXML(script_response);
 
function script_response(response) {
	
var script_answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
if(script_answer == 'true')
{
    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);
}

else{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);

}
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-17 02:32:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Requested for Read Only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 19:34:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Requested For/Read only</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Requested For on Load
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Mathew Kuriakose     Initial implementation  

 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {

var CheckIsMemberOfObj_2 = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.getXML(script_response_2);
 
function script_response_2(response_2) {
	
var script_answer_2 = response_2.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var is_SR= g_user.hasRole('bcgov_sr_service_manager');
	//var is_admin =g_user.hasRole('admin');
	if(g_form.getValue('u_requested_for') ==''&& is_SR==false &&script_answer_2!='true'){
		
		g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',userID);
		
	}
//set field read only
	
if(script_answer_2 == 'true')
{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);
}

else

{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);
}
	
}

}			
			
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-30 23:06:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requested For/Read only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 19:28:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
